parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the number of items of type in the weapon pool (used in campaigns to transfer weapons to the next mission).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[queryItemsPool]] name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  name: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _amountOfFAKgiven = [[queryItemsPool]] "FirstAidKit";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[:Category:Command Group: Weapon Pool|Command Group: Weapon Pool]] [[queryWeaponPool]]
</value></part></template></root>
